LOGIN.NEED_SIGN_IN_USING_SPOTIFY: Pentru a utiliza aplicația trebuie să te conectezi cu contul de Spotify.

COMPARE.SEND_IT_TO_FRIENDS_FOR_COMPARING: Trimite-l la prietenii tăi pentru a vă compara preferințele!
COMPARE.ENTER_USER_CODE_TO_COMPARE: Introdu un cod pentru a te compara cu acea persoana
COMPARE.COULD_NOT_FIND_ANY_TRACKS_OR_ARTISTS: Could not find any tracks or artists that you both like
COMPARE.BOTH_LIKE_ARTIST_AND_TRACK: You both like this artist and track
COMPARE.HERE_ARE_TOP_COMMON_ALL: Get ready to feel the power of music! Here are the top artists and tracks that you both like

COMMON.COULD_NOT_EXTRACT_DATA_FROM_SERVER: Could not extract data from server
COMMON.WHEN_YOU_ONLY_HAVE: When you only have <bold>{{duration}}</bold>, you know what you want
COMMON.YOU_LISTENED_TO_THIS_SONG: You listened to this song <bold>{{count}}</bold> times
COMMON.INVALID_SHARE_LINK: The URL is not a valid Spotify track

LISTENING_STATS.SUBTITLE_1: This app does not have access to information older than the moment that you first used the app
LISTENING_STATS.SUBTITLE_2: To disable user tracking, go to Settings and uncheck Recent Tracks Tracking
LISTENING_STATS.SELECT_DATE_START: Select the Date from which to search
LISTENING_STATS.TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_TRACKS_PER_HOUR: Total number of tracks per hour
LISTENING_STATS.TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_TRACKS_PER_DAY: Total number of tracks per day
LISTENING_STATS.THE_MOST_LISTENED_TRACKS_PERIOD: Here are your most listened tracks from this period

SETTINGS.TEXT_2: Dacă vrei să observi ce face aplicația pe fundal, poți verifica
SETTINGS.TEXT_3: Dezactivarea Urmăririi de Melodii Ascultate va șterge toate datele care sunt legate de această caracteristică!

TOP.TEXT_1: Get ready to feel cool. Or much less cool than you thought

PLAYLIST.HERE_ALL_PLAYLISTS: Here are all of your playlists:
PLAYLIST.SELECT_PLAYLIST: Select a playlist to search into

TRACK_SEARCH.TEXT_1: To get an URI for a track, right click on that track and then select Share > Copy Spotify URI
TRACK_SEARCH.ENTER_URI: Enter a track URI to search it
